title: Bremen 4: Jigoku no Naka no Tenshi-tachi (Bremen 4)
synopsis: TV anime created as a part of "24-Hour Television". Since 1978, Japanese TV network NTV has been doing charity event "24-Hour Television" every summer. Tezuka Production created anime specials for the event under the supervision of Osamu Tezuka. "Bremen 4: Jigoku no Naka no Tenshi-tachi" was produced for the 1981 event. Its title means "Bremen 4: Angels in Hell" in English.
related_anime: ['Fumoon', 'Ginga Tansa 2100-nen: Border Planet', '100-man-nen Chikyuu no Tabi: Bander Book', 'Kaitei Choutokkyuu: Marine Express', 'Black Jack', 'Time Slip Ichimannen: Prime Rose']
staff: [['Tezuka, Osamu', ['Original Creator']], ['Imagawa, Yasuhiro', ['Production Assistant']], ['Grimm, Jacob and Wilhelm', ['Original Creator']], ['Higuchi, Yasuo', ['Music']]]
